me.timothy.loansbot

Class Loan

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.timothy.loansbot.Loan

  • public class Loan
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents, exactly, a database entry for a loan. Lender and borrower are guaranteed not to be prefixed with /u/ for consistency with checking database entries. This is done in the setter methods.

    Lender and borrower are guaranteed to be lower-case and not-null
    Author:
    Timothy
